entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain mixed with snow in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow changing to snow in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
